quest.name: A Sheep to Fly For
objectives: Deliver the muu shuwuu eggs to Jenkshi.

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: I have heard you successfully followed in Bardam's footsteps. This must mean you are capable of flight, yes? Because I require the aid of such an individual.

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: My sheep has fallen ill and I need the eggs of a muu shuwuu in order to treat her.

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: However, I cannot obtain one of their eggs on my own. Muu shuwuu build their nests in high places and I am yet to conquer Bardam's Mettle.

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: Please, bring me three eggs. My flock's lives depend on it!

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: Please, bring me three muu shuwuu eggs. My flock's lives depend on it!

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: Were you able to get three eggs for me? My sheep does not have long left!

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: This disease spreads quickly if not dealt with early on. I could not bear the idea of losing a single sheep, never mind the whole flock.

dialogue.name: JENKSHI
dialogue.text: It shall not be easy, but I too must conquer Bardam's Mettle if I am to look after my flock on my own. Thank you for your help this time, my sheep would be done for without you.
